Please only generate the name of the catalyst and nothing else. Such as TiO2. ZrO2 or Ag, etc.

If there are multiple results, please indicate them as XXX-XXX.

co_catalyst: XXX

evidence.pdf_reference: It has been a promising approach for directly utilizing solar energy to convert CO 2 into clean renewable chemical fuels over photocatalysts with excellent photoreactivity, CO 2 adsorption capacity and reasonable redox potentials.In this work, as-synthesized 3D Bi 2 MoO 6 microspheres with cross-stacking nanosheets via a simple hydrothermal method have been investigated for photocatalytic CO 2 reduction, and characterized by XRD, UV-Vis DRS, SEM, HRTEM and BET.It was found that as-prepared samples

obtained by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (Thermo Fisher ESCALAB 250 xi, England) with Al K radiation (hv 1486.6eV) as the excitation source.The BET specific surface area (S BET ) was measured by a JW-BK122W type physical adsorption instrument. Photocatalytic CO 2 reduction test was carried out in CEL-SPH2N-D9 gas-closed circulation system (Beijing China Education Au-Light Co., Ltd.) under 300 W Xe-lamp irradiation.In the first place, 0.0345 g sample was uniformly dispersed in water (50 mL) with

-1 after 6 h irradiation.At the same time, the presence of H 2 (as a competitive reaction with CO 2 reduction) or CH 4 is not detected by gas chromatography (GC), which remarkably indicates that Bi 2 MoO 6 sample possesses an excellent selectivity of reduced products.Besides, there is no determinable C-related products in the absence of photocatalysts or illumination, meaning that CO generation is indispensably driven by the photocatalyst and light energy.Furthermore, there is no CO detected when the
CO by the analysis of in-situ FTIR.Our findings should provide excellent foundation and guidance for boosting photocatalytic CO 2 conversion to CO with enhanced effective and selective ability.

dispersed in water (50 mL) with magnetic stirring in a quartz glass reactor up to the formation of suspensions.Furthermore, the reaction temperature was controlled strictly 3 C by recirculating cooling water system.In the second place, the whole photoreactor system was vacuumtreated before the introduction of CO 2 gas with high purity.Ultimately, during the reaction process under Xe-lamp irradiation time of 6 h, the quantification of products was identified by on-line gas chromatography (GC-7920, Beijing

In a typical procedure, 1.6866 g Bi(NO 3 ) 3 5H 2 O and 0.4210 g Na 2 MoO 4 2H 2 O were initially dissolved in 5 mL of ethylene glycol (EG) to get transparent solutions A and B, respectively.The two solutions were mixed together, then 20 mL EG was slowly added into the above solution to get solution C, stirring approximately 30 min.Whereafter, the solution C was transferred into a 50 mL Teflonlined autoclave, sealed and heated at 160 C for 24 h.The system was cooled down to room temperature
